title: Me: Anime is a cartoon
body:
Me: but anime is a Japanese style of cartoons
Cousin: Anime is not a cartoon(searches definition) " a style of Japanese film and television animation" see its different
Me: let me ask you are cartoons not an animation? Im telling you anime is a japanese style cartoon
Cousin: lol its like you're trying to compare youtube to vine vids
Me: well they're BOTH videos on DIFFERENT websites/apps 
Cousin: you dont know what you're talking about

Lmfao
